A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was very surprised to see the disconnect between the movie critics and the general audience concerning The Last Jedi on Rotten Tomatoes. I’ll be the first to admit this movie isn’t without flaws. But it is very good\, if not great. It picks up where The Force Awakens left off and answers a lot of questions we all have had. I don’t want to give anything away here so I’m going to keep this short\, but some things reviewers have been criticizing are absolute rubbish. Yes\, there are plot holes. But they aren’t contradictions\, but rather things that you have to assume or imagine because if they explained everything to you then the movie would be much longer than 2.5 hours and everyone would be complaining even more about the movie being too long. The Last Jedi is definitely takes the story in a new direction while keeping the past intact. It’s well worth seeing.
